articles.title: Credit Suisse crisis bigger worry for India than Silicon Valley Bank: Report - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Credit Suisse owns more than 200 billion rupees ($2.4 billion) of assets in India, making it the 12th largest offshore lender. Loans form 73% of its total liabilities in the South Asian nation, with the majority of them of a short tenure.
articles.content:
